bridge WhatsApp and Matrix chats

Related repos

  • Official Matrix.org bridge in beta that connects Matrix rooms and Discord channels, syncing messages, images, and user profiles so you can chat across both platforms
  • Backs up WhatsApp conversations from multiple sources into a searchable interface
  • WhatsApp desktop client for Linux
  • open source messenger for matrix protocol, simple interface, group chats, stickers, encryption
  • Bridges WhatsApp with Claude Code
  • WhatsApp web client for Linux Desktop
  • Analyzes WhatsApp Web group chat dynamics
  • Framework for the WhatsApp Cloud API
  • WhatsApp interface for Emacs
  • REST API for sending WhatsApp messages
